title: Vice President to Hold Roundtable with Business Leaders to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 29, 2009

 



Vice President to Hold Roundtable with Business Leaders to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Vice President   -------------------------------------------------  For Immediate Release                               May 29, 2009  Vice President to Hold Roundtable with Business Leaders to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation   Washington, DC – Vice President Biden will travel to New York next week. On Tuesday, June 2nd at 11:00 AM EDT, the Vice President will bring together business leaders from across the country for a roundtable on how the Recovery Act is not just creating and saving jobs, it’s also creating new business opportunities. This event will take place at Pace University’s Lubin School of Business. The Vice President will be joined by the Deputy Secretary of the Treasury Department Neal Wolin, New York officials and representatives from Pace University.  Due to space limitations, this event will be pooled.
